content: As the global leader in nuclear technologies, Westinghouse is uniquely positioned to support its customers with the solutions required to service and extend the operating life of reactors and support the development of new reactors that will be critical to many countries in order to meet their climate goals and reduce their reliance on foreign energy producers and fossil. Your line is open. Your line is open. Listening to the answers, it sounds like there's a lot of good things in the pipeline, but those good things are perhaps likely not to really materialize until maybe 2024 or beyond, or is -- are there some other factors that might take some of the tailwinds out of those revenue initiatives, whether it's input costs, competitive dynamics, other factors that could reduce some of those tailwinds that sound like a really good momentum in the business. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open.
